Class BallModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BallModel

  • public class BallModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    kq2 The model side of ball world.

      • _errorStrategyFac

        private IStrategyFac _errorStrategyFac
        A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates. Either use the _errorStrategyFac variable directly if you need a factory that makes an error strategy, or call _errorStrategyFac.make() to create an instance of a beeping error strategy.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start timer

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop timer

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This is the method that is called by the view's adapter to the model, i.e. is called by IView2ModelAdapter.paint(). This method will update the sprites's painted locations by painting all the sprites onto the given Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object from the view's paintComponent() call.

      • loadStrategy

        public IUpdateStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String className)
        The following method returns an instance of an IUpdateStrategy, given a shorted class name (Curve) of a subclass of IUpdateStrategy. The method assumes that there is only one constructor for the supplied class that has the same *number* of input parameters as specified in the args array and that it conforms to a specific signature, i.e. specific order and types of input parameters in the args array.
        Parameters:
        className - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object
        Returns:
        An instance of the supplied class.

      • loadPaintStrat

        public IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrat(java.lang.String className)
        The following method returns an instance of an IPaintStrategy,
        Parameters:
        className - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object
        Returns:
        An instance of the supplied class.

      • makeStrategyFac

        public IStrategyFac makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if classname is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
        Returns:
        A factory to make that strategy

      • makePaintStrategy

        public IPaintStrategy makePaintStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IPaintStrategy that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - Shortened name of desired strategy
        Returns:
        A paint strategy

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IStrategyFac combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac stratFac1,
                                        IStrategyFac stratFac2)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()'s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either factory is null, then a factory for a beeping error strategy is returned.
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        stratFac2 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac for the composition of the two strategies

      • fixName

        private java.lang.String fixName(java.lang.String className)
        The utility method that reconstruct the "fully qualified" class name, which includes the package name.
        Parameters:
        className - A user typed string of class. e.g. Curve
        Returns:
        The full name of this class. e.g. strategy.CurveStrategy

      • clearBalls

        public void clearBalls()
        Clear all balls in this ball world (dispatcher)

      • makeBall

        public void makeBall(java.awt.Component canvas,
                     IUpdateStrategy strategy,
                     IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
        Add a ball (sprite) to this ball world (dispatcher).
        Parameters:
        strategy - A strategy that ball should use to update
        canvas - A canvas that all balls will be paint on
        paintStrat - A paint strategy
